data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 103,187 believers in Kiev to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kiev, Ukraine
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Kiev, Ukraine need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 babies will be born in the next hour to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Kiev, Ukraine.
data.prayer: Father, make yourself real to these new families.
Spirit, help the 103,187 believers find a person of peace today among the 2,744,014 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 103,187 believers in Kiev.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Pashtun, Southern people might believe through him.

Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Kiev, Ukraine to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Kiev, Ukraine honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Kiev, Ukraine to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.
